name: mainframe-module-auth
description: An auth module for mainframe-core to handle multiple users.

scripts.start: rm -rf out/ && babel lib --out-dir out/lib && babel test --out-dir out/test
scripts.test: rm -rf out/ && babel lib --out-dir out/lib && babel test --out-dir out/test && node out/test/mainframe-module-auth.js

author: iLambda
